examples: Meat and mass never hindered man.
Men still hold most positions of power in this country.
Both men wore confident smiles.
Man, that was a black day for the organization.
All men must die.
words.defineEn: a person who is a male adult
words.defineVi: một người là nam giới trưởng thành

examples: The woman has eyes like a hawk!
The woman hit the mugger with her umbrella.
The old woman knitted blankets for her grandchildren.
That young woman was close as an oyster!
Women sometimes damage their skin by going overboard with abrasive cleansers.
words.defineEn: a person who is a female adult
words.defineVi: một người là phụ nữ trưởng thành

examples: Boys his age are a law unto themselves.
In his mother’s eyes, the boy can do no wrong.
Boy meets girl, boy loses girl, yadda yadda yadda.
A boy took us to our room.
"That boy isn't very bright."
words.defineEn: someone who is a child and a male
words.defineVi: một người là một đứa trẻ và một người đàn ông

examples: The girls looked so pretty in their summer dresses.
The girl held her father's hand tightly.
The girls watched the development of this relationship with incredulity.
These girls play for keeps.
The poor girl was almost beside herself.
words.defineEn: someone who is a child and a female
words.defineVi: một người là một đứa trẻ và một phụ nữ

examples: Friends shared a platter of crispy chicken wings with tangy dipping sauces at the sports bar.
The new student quickly made friends with the other musicians, because birds of a feather flock together.
My friends enjoyed tangy barbecue gammon skewers at the summer barbecue.
My friend prefers a vegetarian sandwich with avocado and sprouts.
My friends enjoyed smoky beef rib chops at the countryside barbecue.
words.defineEn: someone we know well, like a lot, and trust, but normally they are not part of our family
words.defineVi: một người mà chúng ta biết rõ, rất thích và tin tưởng, nhưng thông thường họ không phải là một phần của gia đình chúng ta

examples: She brought her boyfriend to the party.
Has she got a new boyfriend?
She introduced her boyfriend to her parents during the family gathering.
Her boyfriend is an amateur race car driver who really lives on the edge.
Mentioning her new boyfriend just rubbed salt into the wound.
words.defineEn: a man that you love and are in a relationship with
words.defineVi: một người đàn ông mà bạn yêu và đang trong một mối quan hệ với

examples: Her intelligence and kindness make her the perfect girlfriend.
"Will you be my girlfriend?"
He memorized his girlfriend's address by heart.
My girlfriend and I are planning a weekend getaway to the beach.
He introduced his girlfriend to his friends at the party last night.
words.defineEn: ‌a lady that you love and are in a relationship with
words.defineVi: một người phụ nữ mà bạn yêu và đang có mối quan hệ với

examples: The helicopter transported the injured person to the hospital.
Every person has the right to express their opinions and beliefs.
One person argued the toss for four hours before he agreed to pay.
A person's character can often be deduced from their actions.
The other person had the wrong end of the stick, and now you needed to correct the misapprehension.
words.defineEn: one human being, when gender or age is not relevant
words.defineVi: một con người, khi giới tính hoặc tuổi tác không liên quan

examples: People held handkerchiefs over their mouths.
People came from all over the country.
A regular newsletter keeps people in touch with local events.
people living in rural areas.
People around the world enjoy various forms of music as a universal language.
words.defineEn: human beings as a group, including men, women, and children
words.defineVi: con người như một nhóm, bao gồm cả đàn ông, phụ nữ và trẻ em

examples: Adults were also at risk from epidemics.
The child's cry of fear alerted the adults to the presence of a spider.
The child will become an adult.
Adults have the freedom to make their own decisions and choices.
As an adult, she took on the responsibilities of her career and family.
words.defineEn: a fully grown man or woman
words.defineVi: một người đàn ông hoặc phụ nữ trưởng thành hoàn toàn

examples: The baby had chubby cheeks and a cute face.
The baby cried its head off.
The baby has brought them great joy.
The mother gently cradled her newborn baby in her arms.
The lioness carefully groomed her newborn baby.
words.defineEn: a child who is very young, usually too young to walk or speak
words.defineVi: một đứa trẻ còn rất nhỏ, thường còn quá nhỏ để đi hoặc nói
